reviewComments: A very small fort. But what was impressive are the fort walls which are in good condition. And close by is the birth place of Tipu Sultan.
this is the only fort which can be found in good condition in karnataka the front portion is still intact and tourist can have a real experience of the olden days when you climb... read more
I really felt happy visiting the cultured monument. Yes we feel happy visiting this place because this fort includes all about our Tippu sulthan who had ruled here.
This fort is located near Bangalore airport. Dont go here with too much expectation as there is not much to see. There is just an entrance to the fort and walls surrounding the... read more
Unless you are on your way out to someplace else on NH7 and have nothing better to do, this is not worth a visit. Even if you do visit, don't bother going inside the fort.
Devanahalli Fort.address: Off NH7, beyond BIAL , Devanahalli , India
